DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the investigators internet-based intervention is effective to help hazardous drinkers reducing their alcohol consumption.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of an Internet-based Intervention for Hazardous Drinkers
DOC.criteria: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test (AUDIT) score from 6 (female) or 7 (male) to 12
